channel.title: CVE Feed for Go toolchain -- cmd/go
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go toolchain -- cmd/go

item.title: CVE-2024-24787|2024-05-08T15:31:14.530Z -- Go toolchain -- cmd/go
item.description: On Darwin, building a Go module which contains CGO can trigger arbitrary code execution when using the Apple version of ld, due to usage of the -lto_library flag in a "#cgo LDFLAGS" directive.
